Class Config

java.lang.Object
code.Config
public class Config extends Object
Controls which features are activated in the game. Stores configuration settings for the game (feature toggles, task number, operand range).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Config()
    Standard constructor.
